paper_abstract: Association rule mining is a key issue in data mining. However, the classical models ignore the difference between the transactions, and the weighted association rule mining does not work on databases with only binary attributes. In this paper, we introduce a new measure w-support, which does not require preassigned weights. It takes the quality of transactions into consideration using link-based models. A fast miming algorithm is given, and a large amount of experimental results are presented.
paper_title: Mining weighted association rules without preassigned weights
